channel.title: Casting 317 PI
channel.description: Why wont any spells in all my mage books take away runes once a spell is cast?? any help would be nice thanks. P,S dont be a huge jerk and say use the search bar I already did on all rsps websites theres nothing

item.title: Casting 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:2, topic:510968”][quote author=jamie233 link=topic=629214.msg4269946#msg4269946 date=1364441620]
Why wont any spells in all my mage books take away runes once a spell is cast?? any help would be nice thanks.
P,S dont be a huge jerk and say use the search bar I already did on all rsps websites theres nothing
[/quote]Clickingbuttons, ClickingMost, or ActionButtons, it should be in one of those files, you have to add the requried runes, with an if statement.[/quote]
Ah! Yes! found it thanks

Read full topic

P,S dont be a huge jerk and say use the search bar I already did on all rsps websites theres nothing[/quote]Clickingbuttons, ClickingMost, or ActionButtons, it should be in one of those files, you have to add the requried runes, with an if statement.
